review: Screen mirroring sucks. The dedicated apps work pretty good though.
author: The Infamous

review: Product has changed everything, anything you can do on your phone or tablet you can do on TV.YouTube, Netflix, Hulu, HBO GO,videos and so much more
author: daniel

review: Great for streaming stuff to my HDTV. Let's me make the most out of that technology while keeping me confined to my couch while entertaining myself.
author: Earl Temple

review: makes watching netflix real easy, right from the phone
author: Travelin' Queen "Queenie"

review: Apparently chrome cast is not compatible with iphone 6 and a Mitsubishi projector TV (2010). Tried two different ones and it connected for a second, then would randomly turn off and couldn't get it to work again. Tried many things, even with a Samsung tablet and still wouldn't connect to the TV..
author: Rena Mae

review: Tweets out sometimes. Not sure if it's my iPhone app or the unit itself. When it works (4/5 times - hence the star rating) it does a fine job of casting to my TV.
author: Joe

review: I bought this to use in the bedroom since that tv doesn't have the capability of having the Netflix app on the tv itself. I run it through the Iphone and it seems to work good so far.
author: MMCher "M"

review: Took some time to figure it out but it was worth it
author: bill masiarik

review: Love this thing!  Streaming videos from phone to tv super easy!
author: Amazon Customer
